name: fitglue-web
description: FitGlue web frontend and Firebase Hosting configuration

scripts.build:static: npm run prebuild:static && npx skier build
scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:app && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:static && vite build --mode development && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:test: npm run build:static && vite build --mode test && npm run postbuild
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:static && vite build --mode production && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp -r static-dist/* dist/ && sh -c 'if [ -d dist/public ]; then cp -r dist/public/* dist/ && rm -rf dist/public; fi' && sh -c 'if [ -d dist/app ]; then mkdir -p dist/app-temp && mv dist/app/* dist/app-temp/ 2>/dev/null || true; mkdir -p dist/app && mv dist/app-temp/index.html dist/app/ && rm -rf dist/app-temp; fi'
scripts.local-prod: npm run build:prod && npx firebase serve --only hosting

author: James King
